Notices the water rising and tries to clear the drain.

Responds to Greta and Yvonne's greetings despite feeling a little glum, engages socially.

Alice notices strange occurrences, pursues a mysterious figure (the nun) up the steps and into an ominous asylum, and explores a deserted, dark, and potentially dangerous corridor despite the unsettling atmosphere.

Sits bolt upright and shouts 'No!!!!' in reaction to doctor’s command, resisting submission.
